channel.title: Andor on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Andor on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Riz Ahmed Explains How a Real-Life Robbery Inspired ‘Relay’ Role and Why He’s Glad He Didn’t Appear on ‘Andor’
item.description: The ‘Rogue One’ star joked to ‘Andor’ creator Tony Gilroy that he should get a consolation prize for not being on the show: “Does that mean I’m getting a Bodhi Rook standalone movie?”

item.title: Riz Ahmed Explains How a Real-Life Robbery Inspired ‘Relay’ Role and Why He’s Glad He Didn’t Appear on ‘Andor’
item.description: The ‘Rogue One’ star joked to ‘Andor’ creator Tony Gilroy that he should get a consolation prize for not being on the show: “Does that mean I’m getting a Bodhi Rook standalone movie?”

item.title: Tony Gilroy Says He Can’t See Himself Doing Anything Like ‘Andor’ Ever Again
item.description: The creator, showrunner, head writer and EP discusses his naivete before signing on to the Disney+ ‘Star Wars’ prequel series, and how COVID saved him from himself.

item.title: Tony Gilroy Says He Can’t See Himself Doing Anything Like ‘Andor’ Ever Again
item.description: The creator, showrunner, head writer and EP discusses his naivete before signing on to the Disney+ ‘Star Wars’ prequel series, and how COVID saved him from himself.
